item.title: Keep Left Bollards, 26th July
item.description:
On Bexley High Street at the junction with Vicarage Road, Bexley: A vehicle has collided with two “Keep Left” reflective bollards on the mini-roundabout. Both have been taken out of the ground as a result.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, North Cray Road, Bexley, London

item.title: Signs leading to dog poop bags left on pavement, 26th July
item.description:
Please, Westminster, put up some crystal clear signs. E.g. “Bag and bin your dogs poo”. Current signs are vague e.g. “Clean up after your dog” means to some people here that they can then leave the bag on the pavement. See photos. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montagu Square, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: To whom it concerns my neighbor at 21 Corsley Way, London E9 5PD keeps playing loud music on 25/07/25 at 23:15pm he has a professional music deck in his living room. Constantly playing music all Hours on and off mixing music tracks as that is his professional hobby. If someone could please address this issue causing me so much stress and restless nights antisocial behaviour.., 25th July
